If there is, the Scanner.nextLine() method is used to move the scanner position to the next line and return the line that was skipped. This line is then appended to the JTextArea using the JTextArea.append() method. The "\n" is added to the end of each line to ensure that each line from the file appears on a new line in the JTextArea. Finally, the Scanner is closed using the Scanner.close() method.
